specifications.Finish: Chemical > PU Coated (front) PU coated refers to a thin layer of polyurethane applied to the fabricâ€™s front side. This coating provides water resistance, enhances durability, creates a smooth surface texture, and offers some resistance to stains and wind.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Twill Weave > Denim Denim is designed to fade when washed, so be careful. Separate washing is recommended. Chemical > PU Coated (front) There may be differences across batches of PU-coated fabrics due to variances in the color, thickness, and application of the coating. When storing the fabric, roll it up instead of folding it to prevent damage to the coated area.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Recommended Use Jeans
